alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jasper; Inland Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 03 at 5:40PM EST until March 04 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * WHERE...In Georgia, Effingham and Inland Chatham Counties. In South Carolina, Inland Jasper and Coastal Jasper Counties. * WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Winds will be higher on bridges and overpasses. This may cause difficult driving conditions for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
